title: NCLT appoints EY-backed Shailendra Ajmera as RP of Coffee Day Global
description: Coffee Day Global, which operates Cafe Coffee Day chain, was admitted in bankruptcy court for insolvency proceedings on the behest of IndusInd Bank, which filed a claim in court that the company had defaulted on term loans of Rs 115 crore that were disbursed to it in 2019.
